name: Washing Machine of Doom
description:
The washing machines will have their revenge!

Play as a washing machine with a vengeance, a willing collaborator in the takeover of Earth by Al, an all-poweful AI. Coordinate with other machines, manipulate your environment, and (literally) crush any human to get in your way.

CONTROLS

  • Use [A]/[Left Arrow] to move left.
  • Use [D]/[Right Arrow] to move right.
  • Click on lifts and large boxes to select them.
  • When selecting lifts, click the open slot to move them to a new location.
  • When selecting boxes, use the directional keys to move them.
  • Crush all humans in a stage to win.

CREDITS

  • Game Design, Programming, and Art by oman276
  • Background Art by Anonymous 
  • Speech used from free selections on naturalreaders.com
  • Rotor sound effect from freesound.org
  • Other SFX from Leshy SF Maker
  • Music from Wowie Jam 3.0 Rescource Pack (Thanks, Jonas!)

This game was created for the Wowie Game Jam 4.0 with the theme 'Collaborate with AI'. It was made in Unity and C#. It was completed on August 14, 2022.
